channel.title: Some options keep resetting themselves or change
channel.description:
To start off I want to thank you guys for this amazing rehash of the mod, multiplayer is tons of fun. However, Some options in the options menu reset themselfes everytime I restart the game.
Options like "Enable auto-aim" do this. As well as some options in the control rebinds like strave left and right. I rebind them to use the arrow keys (left handed use) however It keeps resetting them to ","and ".". Hopefully you'll be able to fix them soon. ^^

item.title: Some options keep resetting themselves or change
item.dc:creator: Giovanni1
item.description:
To start off I want to thank you guys for this amazing rehash of the mod, multiplayer is tons of fun. However, Some options in the options menu reset themselfes everytime I restart the game.

Options like “Enable auto-aim” do this. As well as some options in the control rebinds like strave left and right. I rebind them to use the arrow keys (left handed use) however It keeps resetting them to ","and “.”. Hopefully you’ll be able to fix them soon. ^^

Read full topic
